h1_content: Lang-Baw-Baw is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This frog boss is the final of the six you can find across the chapters.
h2_content:
When you've beaten the Gold Armored Rhino head for the edge of the cliff (the opposite side to the Keeper's Shrine and where you entered the fight).
When you get to the edge, look down to see a muddy clearing. Down here, you can find the next optional boss, which is the final frog Lang-Baw-Baw.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Baw-Baw.md', located in the main section titled 'Lang-Baw-Baw'. The section summary is: Lang-Baw-Baw is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This frog boss is the final of the six you can find across the chapters. This excerpt merges content from both the main and sub-sections. The sub-section is titled 'How to Find Lang-Baw-Baw', and the detailed content is as follows:
When you've beaten the Gold Armored Rhino head for the edge of the cliff (the opposite side to the Keeper's Shrine and where you entered the fight).
When you get to the edge, look down to see a muddy clearing. Down here, you can find the next optional boss, which is the final frog Lang-Baw-Baw.
